use the soap bottle and make the dirty plates clean .
Find a knife and apple ,then slice the apple to your wish .

Break the egg into a pan, and put the pan on the stove to cook the egg.

Take the lecttuce and slice it into smaller piece and put it into the pot, and boill the soup.
Firstly find a pot for boiling, and take a water to your need , if its ready boiled the water .
Firstly find a eggs in room and in that if it is cracked then throw away.
Firstly find the fridge in the room , if the fridge is filled with things then clear the fridge .

Locate potato. Locate knife. Use knife to slice potato. Pick up sliced potato. Walk sliced potato to microwave. Open microwave door. Put sliced potato in microwave. Close microwave door. Turn microwave on.
Pick up cup. Walk to wine bottle. Open wine bottle. Pour wine from wine bottle into cup until the cup is full. Close wine bottle. Place wine bottle down.
Pick up the apple, lettuce, egg, and tomato. Walk to the fridge. Open the fridge door. Place the apple, lettuce, egg, and tomato inside the fridge. Close the fridge door.
Pick up the cup. Walk to the sink. Place the cup inside the sink basin. Turn the sink's faucet on. Wait until the cup is full. Turn the sink's faucet off. Pick up cup.

Pick up the potato. Walk to the stove. Put the potato in the pan. Pick up the pan. Walk to the sink. Put the pan in the sink basin. Turn on the sink's faucet. Wait until the pan is full of water. Turn off the sink's faucet. Pick up the pan. Walk to the stove. Place the pan on the stove. Turn on the stove. Watch potato until it is tender. Turn off the stove. Pick up the potato. Place potato in the bowl. Pick up pan. Walk to sink. Empty water from the pan in the sink. Put pan down in the sink basin.
Walk to the apple slices in the room. Pick up the extra apple slices. Walk to the bin. Open the bin. Place the apple slices in the bin. Close the bin.
Pick up the butter knife, fork, knife, spatula and spoon. Walk to the drawer. Open the drawer. Place the butter knife, fork, knife, spatula and spoon inside the drawer. Close the drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_6
Description: Pick up the cup. Walk to the sink. Dump the coffee from the cup into the sink basin. Place the cup down in the sink basin.
Pick up the pot. Walk to the sink. Pour the water from the pot into the sink basin. Place the pot in the sink basin.
Locate the light switch. Walk to the light switch. Activate the light switch.
First locate the laptop. Then start using the laptop
Switch on the TV first. Then watch the television

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_6
Description: Find the watch. Pick it up and look at the time.

Firstly take all the things that can be picked up and fit into the box (like credit card, key chain, news paper, remote, tissue box etc.). Now put all the things inside the box, close the box and pack it.
